Career Profile

I am into Mobile Applications Domain since last 8 years and worked on all major Platforms (Android,iOS,Windows Phone 8). I over 6 years of experience as software trainer and author and and subject matter expert in Android, iOS and Mac development.

I have worked on projects for some of major clients named as BMW,American Express,FirstData,Wallmart and Bank of America. I am active member of Google Developer Group Mumbai where I deliver talks on Google Technologies like Google App Engine, Python and Android development. I am also an active contributor on Stack Overflow community which helps developers worldwide to solve issues in their Android or iOS Projects.
